explains: n. 人文主义者，人文学者

sentences.en: I was going to be a complete engineer: technical genius and sensitive humanist all in one.
sentences.cn: 我本要成为一个全面的工程师：技术天才和敏感人文学者的结合体。

sentences.en: He is a practical humanist, who believes in the dignity of mankind.
sentences.cn: 他是个真正的人道主义者，信奉人类的尊严。

sentences.en: Lu Xun, said Mr. Wang, was actually a humanist.
sentences.cn: 汪晖说鲁迅实际上是一位人文主义者。
